lead_paragraph: Queen Elizabeth II’s birthday celebrations in May will not feature representatives of the Palio race in Tuscany, who said their request for certain conditions was not met.

headline.print_headline: Seeking a Grander Role, Tuscan Horsemen Decline to Join a Royal Pageant
headline.main: Italy’s Famed Palio Horsemen Decline Royal Invitation

snippet: Queen Elizabeth II’s birthday celebrations in May will not feature representatives of the Palio race in Tuscany, who said their request for certain conditions was not met.
abstract: Representatives of Palio, famous Tuscan horse event, decline offer to participate with other international equestrian groups at 90th birthday celebration of England's Queen Elizabeth II; officials humbly object to necessary compromises involved in staging medieval race outside native Siena.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
